[Page Title: O'Brion's Pub & Grille | Best Pub in the Charleston Area]

O’Brion’s Pub & Grille

…because God gave us Guinness, good friends and college football.
View Our Menu

350+

Dine In

Take Out

Delivery

Welcome To O’Brion’s

Our Story

Established in 2001, O’Brion’s Pub & Grille stands as a cornerstone of the I’On community in Mt. Pleasant, SC. Renowned for its authentic Irish atmosphere, delectable cuisine, and welcoming service, O’Brion’s has been the go-to spot for locals to gather, watch sports, or simply unwind after a long day. Regulars know that stepping into O’Brion’s means entering a haven where good times and great memories are always on tap.

As of January 2024, O’Brion’s Pub & Grille has embarked on an exciting new chapter under new ownership. With a commitment to preserving the beloved charm of the establishment while introducing fresh updates, renovations, and improvements, the future of O’Brion’s promises to be even brighter.

From upgraded facilities to a refreshed menu, the changes underway only serve to enhance what loyal patrons have come to know and love about O’Brion’s, ensuring that it remains the heart and soul of the community for years to come.

Menu

Savor classic Irish favorites like fish and chips and shepherd’s pie, alongside a perfectly poured Guinness, plus soup, sandwiches, and salads including our world famous award winning (not really, just delicious) Philly cheesesteak, colossal chicken fingers and French onion soup.
*Prices may vary depending on using 3rd party delivery services Download The Menu 
Gallery

Specials

Happy Hour
Monday – Friday from 4PM – 7PM 
$1 Off Domestic Beers
$1 Off House Wine
$1 Off House Liquor

Philly Night

$8 Steak or Chicken Philly, every Tuesday!
(Dine In Only) 7PM – 9:30PM

Extended Happy Hour

Every Tuesday from 4PM – 9:30PM

What's On Tap

Explore our ever-changing selection of craft beers and local favorites on tap. Whether you’re craving a classic brew or something new, we’ve got the perfect pint waiting for you at O'Brion's Pub in Charleston, SC.

Events

Stay updated on upcoming events, weekly specials, and improvements by subscribing to our newsletter for the latest news and exclusive offers. Join us in the excitement!
